channel.title: Conquest
channel.description: Conquest Conquest is a 317 Server loading 562/602 Maps and other aspects. Here at Conquest we strive to provide each player with a pleasant and enjoyable stay, through our dedicated host and staff team. Conquest constantly goes through new updates to ensure that the players are always kept entertained with new content. As the owner of Conquest, I am completely dedicated to making the most enjoyable experience possible for each and every player, and as our motto says “Conquest is made by the players, for the players”, and we strive to uphold that motto every day. Links: [url=http://conquest-rsps.com/home/]Home[/url] [url=http://conquest-rsps.com/forums/]Forums[/url] [url=http://conquest-rsps.com/home/DownloadLinks/ConquestV2.jar]Downloadable Client[/url] [url=http://rspscoding.org/play/?name=Conquest]Webclient[/url] We advise you to play the Downloadable client as it includes all of our own models + further customisations but it is your choice. Main Features: Fully working "Buy X" and "Sell X" Fully working curses Fully working spell books with correct animations Player owned shops fully working Custom Dungeoneering System All skills working Custom quest tab Fully working XP Counter Fully working Money Pouch Fully working emotes Plenty of bosses to fight Fully working slayer system Auto-Join clan chat on login Chaotics/Nex sets/Primal equipment 5 Fully Mini games A more fun skilling system Brand new VPS 24/7 Uptime NO LAG Daily updates Great Economy Dedicated staff/owner Great community And much more. All we ask is for you to try out Conquest, because we’re certain that you will enjoy it and would want to continue playing it, so come give us a try.

item.title: Conquest
item.dc:creator: @popcorn57 popcorn57
item.description:
@popcorn57 wrote:

[quote=“Conquest317, post:4, topic:550524”][quote author=popcorn57 link=topic=669434.msg4476495#msg4476495 date=1426185311]
(PICTURES OF SERVER BELOW)

Purpose of this: No media so showing people what they are downloading first.

Just signed on to see how it was. Staff is very friendly and owner seems active and chill.

But sadly no work has been done to the server except change the name to conquest. If you want server media look at this post.

https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=642681.0

The npc’s and the stalls are even in the same spots and all of the skilling areas are exactly the same, same interfaces.

I have taken side by side screen shots to show the differences that have been made

-And the starter is 14m and the 2nd account you get 5m. with ip changer can easily be abused.

-It still is very new server and i’m sure that they will make some changes to it.

-Again the staff is very friendly but owner is not looking for other coders so who knows where this server will end up in the future.

-5 constant players online

-And is “eco”.

-But go ahead and try it out if this is what you are looking for in a server but my personal opinion they just slapped on the name conquest and put online just to make a quick buck.

-Even when the cache is downloaded it still even says in your C://Acheron.cache
[/quote]

You may not think that i’ve actually made any changes, but you’re only judging the server from the graphical aspects. Since hosting this server i’ve done a countless amount of updates daily, and no i’m not hosting the server “to make a quick buck”, i’m only doing this for the purpose of enjoyment, I don’t care if I get $1 from this or $1000, as long as i’m still having fun, then there is nothing else to it.[/quote]

Was just my opinion good luck with your server!

Read full topic

item.description:
@Conquest317 wrote:

Conquest
Conquest is a 317 Server loading 562/602 Maps and other aspects.
Here at Conquest we strive to provide each player with a pleasant and enjoyable stay, through our dedicated host and staff team. Conquest constantly goes through new updates to ensure that the players are always kept entertained with new content. As the owner of Conquest, I am completely dedicated to making the most enjoyable experience possible for each and every player, and as our motto says “Conquest is made by the players, for the players”, and we strive to uphold that motto every day.
Links:
Home
Forums
Downloadable Client
Webclient
We advise you to play the Downloadable client as it includes all of our own models + further customisations but it is your choice.
Main Features:
Fully working “Buy X” and "Sell X"
Fully working curses
Fully working spell books with correct animations
Player owned shops fully working
Custom Dungeoneering System
All skills working
Custom quest tab
Fully working XP Counter
Fully working Money Pouch
Fully working emotes
Plenty of bosses to fight
Fully working slayer system
Auto-Join clan chat on login
Chaotics/Nex sets/Primal equipment
5 Fully Mini games
A more fun skilling system
Brand new VPS
24/7 Uptime
NO LAG
Daily updates
Great Economy
Dedicated staff/owner
Great community
And much more.
All we ask is for you to try out Conquest, because we’re certain that you will enjoy it and would want to continue playing it, so come give us a try.
